name: GAF -GMTK2020
description:
This game was created in under 48 hours for the GMTK
Game Jam 2020 under the theme "Out of Control".
Use WASD to move, press 'e' to interact, and click with the
left mouse button to confirm text options.
This game was made by Jacob Rainbow and Liam Shine.
Find more of Liam Shine's art on Instagram @lem.shine

Thank you for playing.
